item.title: Gaming progress and procrastination
item.description:
Many games have achievement trackers that allow the player to aim for an arbitrary objective. The most sophisticated versions bundle objectives into groups that give a sense of a clear progression that hides the tedious steps required.

World of Warcraft is such and I’ve generally looked over these artificial achievements focusing instead of the more obvious level increase and zone discovery. Recently however things have changed and I’ve manage to go through several layers of repetitive game play with only the achievement system as a guide.

item.title: Why so many coins ?
item.description: At the time of writing, there are 1059 cryptocurrencies listed of the coinmarketcap.com, ( the go-to website for price, market information ). The list starts with Bitcoin, Ethereum and Ripple at the top and ends with ELcoin, microCoin and Turbocoin. The question : why do many coins ? Do we really need so many different digital currencies ? Is it even conceivable that even 50 of them have a stable long term future.

item.title: Decentralized currency for the decentralized individual

item.title: As long as your brain is in motion
item.description: So long as your brain is active, thinking and growing then you are. Rigidity and decay that with how with think the evolving world around us. item.title: Only a wish?
item.description: How realistic can one be when longing for a smarter world to live in, for brighter minds to connect with ? This world can be much smarter that it is today at the individual and collective levels.

item.title: I'm a progressive because
item.description: I believe that left to their our devices humans could veer towards inhumanity by unleashing their inner demons. History has taught us than humans can unleash horror. The nazis weren’t aliens from another planet. They were human. And these humans devised and carried out a massive plan of torture and extermination. This historic incident repeated itself in various forms and different levels of intensity with the Stalin purges, Pol Pot in Cambodia or even in Rwanda.
